Very cute movie, different kind of story but very human. We enjoyed watching it.
Interesting and poignant film about a man whose conscience has kept him from "living".  I loved all the ensemble cast in this movie.
This is a wonderful movie filmed not far from where I live which makes it even more interesting.

My grandfather loves his new movie.

This is one of my all time favorite movies.  I'd probably rented it three or four times before finally buying it so I could lend it to friends. And yes, I will watch it again myself soon. You can't beat  Robert Duvall; Sissy Spacek and Bill Murray if you want to be entertained.  Bonus facts:  No high speed chases, no guns and no idiots out for revenge.  This is a true "adult movie". Nothing in it to harm young kids, but not much to interest them either. Enjoy.
Ok maybe, but overpriced at almost $14.

Great movie! If you like deep deep movies this is for you! It's quiet, dark, and serious and you will fall in love with the characters. Has some of the best lines ever! Classic as far as I'm concerned! It smolders until it burns!!!
